mapper.select: select dvalue,dicname from dictionaries where is_delete = 0 and dtype = #{dtype}
select ad.id from adminsinfo ad, account ac, authorities au where ac.username = au.username and au.authorities = "ADMIN" and ad.is_delete = 0 and ac.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into journalism(joutitle, joucontent, joutype, starttime, endtime, pubid, j_type) values(#{joutitle}, #{joucontent}, #{joutype}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{pubid}, #{j_type})
